description:
Proton Bridge button in top panel.

 Hides Proton Bridge app window at app start-up. Click on button shows/hides this window or launches Proton VPN app. Icon is highlighted when app is launched.

 Useful for those who don't want to use Ubuntu AppIndicators extension (Proton Bridge in systray's legacy indicators).

 This extension is not affiliated, funded or in any way associated with Proton Mail.
name: Proton Bridge Button
